DOC.brief_summary: To investigate advantage use 4Fr guide catheter 6 Fr , frequencies radial artery occlusion transradial coronary intervention ( TRI ) evaluate . Radial artery occlusion rate 4 Fr TRI group expect 6Fr group .

Exclusion criterion current study include plan use cut balloon , rotational atherectomy , directional coronary atherectomy , intravascular ultrasound , compatible 4-Fr catheter . Patency radial artery TRI evaluate pulsation radial artery , frequency compare receive 4Fr vs 6 Fr coronary intervention .
